mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge(app_type, title, content, creator, link, tag) VALUES (#{appType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{creator}, #{link}, #{tag})
mapper.select: SELECT id, app_type, title, content, link, tag FROM knowledge JOIN knowledge_review_state krs on knowledge.id = krs.knowledge_id WHERE creator = #{userId} AND next_review_time < NOW() AND finished = 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
